info.name: Anonymous Pokemon Showdown Style
info.description: An anonymous Pokemon Showdown style. It's a dark css, it looks awesome. If you have any question, you can find me at servers such as Origin.
info.additionalInfo:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    11ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - Added some credits

    16ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - Fixed the movemenu button fairy's and the cancelSearch button's css


    22ⁿᵈ April 2015:
      - fixed some transitions

    27ⁿᵈ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons
